pros:
Face pace high energy!
Very good benefits
Top 50 employer 
Great Location right downtown Toronto
Easily accessible by local public transit
cons:
Lowest paid employees in the Toronto area
shift work and set on schedules all based on sick calls
On call 24/7
Work Holidays, weekends, days, afternoons, and nights.
Not easily accessible by motor vehicle 
Parking is outrages in prices

review_title: It was good for a while, but not for a lifetime
pros: Good stable environment, relative job security, good benefits, organised pay schemes.
cons: Politics, lack of opportunities for advancement, management playing favoritism with some employees, lots of posiions redundant
